<title level="1" right="Hazard 2" pfs="">[Dropping Web Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=275)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 88</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A 30-foot-wide rope bridge spans a 30-foot-deep chasm between two crags on the mountainside.

---

**Stealth**
DC 21 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 15 [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) or DC 18 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) to secure the bridge in place.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Collapse** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** One Large, two Medium, or three Small creatures move onto the rope bridge; **Effect** The bridge collapses and creatures on the bridge fall 30 feet, taking 15 points of bludgeoning damage. The triggering creatures can attempt a DC 18 Reflex save to [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95) to avoid falling.

---
**Reset**
1 hour.
